summary: Build a beautiful website for Herwellness that provides personalized female wellness information and offers free digital wellness kits plus wellness challenge programs for women.
architectural_notes: Surface Herwellness Instagram link in the header navigation (in addition to the footer).

existing_features.title: Create a cohesive, beautiful Herwellness marketing website with a consistent visual theme (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a women’s wellness brand, applied across all pages and UI states.

Implement public marketing pages and navigation for Herwellness including: Home (value proposition + primary calls to action), Personalized Wellness (entry point to personalization flow), Wellness Kits (browse kits), Challenges (browse programs), and About/FAQ.

Add a personalization flow that collects user wellness preferences via an on-site questionnaire (e.g., goals, age range, activity level, focus areas) and then displays a personalized wellness information summary/recommendations page based on the responses.
Support Internet Identity sign-in to enable saving and retrieving a user’s personalization profile and their challenge participation status.
Create a Wellness Kits section that lets users browse a list of free digital wellness kits, view kit details, and download kit assets.

Create a Wellness Challenges section that lets users discover challenge programs, view program details (duration, daily/weekly tasks), and join/leave a challenge; when joined, show a simple progress UI (e.g., checklist of days/tasks) and allow marking tasks as complete.

Add basic content-management-friendly structure so wellness kits and challenges can be updated in code in a single place (e.g., a seed list in the backend or a frontend constants file) without touching multiple screens.
Add standard product-quality UX details: loading states, empty states, and error states for personalization submission, kits list/detail, challenges list/detail, and join/progress actions.

Add generated static brand imagery and integrate it into the UI (logo, hero visual, and a small set of kit/challenge cover images) stored under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.

Add a configurable Instagram handle/link for Herwellness and surface it in the site UI (at minimum in the footer; optionally also in the header/menu) as a clickable link that opens Instagram in a new tab.
Create a new "Free PDFs" resources section that lists multiple PDF resources and allows users to download them from the website.
Add navigation entry points to the new Free PDFs page so users can discover it from the marketing site.
Add static PDF files for the Free PDFs section to the frontend public assets and reference them from the Free PDFs content list via stable paths.
Add a visible Instagram link to the SiteHeader (desktop header navigation and mobile menu) that uses the configured Instagram URL and opens in a new tab.
Update the site configuration so the canonical Instagram URL is set to https://www.instagram.com/herwellness_2026/ and the header/footer use this configuration value.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a beautiful marketing website for Herwellness
Provide personalized female wellness information on the website
Offer free digital wellness kits for women (browse/access/download)
Offer wellness challenge programs for women (discover/join/participate)

Implement a single Motoko backend actor to store and retrieve: user profiles (principal), saved personalization responses/results, available wellness kits metadata, available challenge programs metadata, and per-user challenge participation/progress.
Add Herwellness Instagram handle/link to the website (e.g., header/footer/contact section)
Add a section to upload/list and allow users to download free PDF resources (free PDFs)
